features: MENS CONDITIONER: American Crew Daily Moisturizing Conditioner restores, strengthens, and protects. Hair is left feeling soft, manageable, and ready for styling
FOR YOUR HAIR: Our triple action vegan and solicon-free formula detangles while Vitamin B5 moisturizes hair without weighing it down promoting healthy looking hair
INGREDIENTS: Includes essential nutrients formulated with 91% naturally derived ingredients to detangle and reduce hair breakage, with packaging made with 80% post-consumer recycled plastics
HOW TO USE: After shampooing, massage a small amount into hair and scalp ensuring it distributes evenly and leave on for 2 - 3 min. Rinse well. Suitable for men with normal to dry hair.

WHO WE ARE: American Crew is a leader in, Men's Grooming for HAIR, BODY, SHAVE, STYLE, FRAGRANCE categories. American Crew's ongoing commitment is to elevate men's style and enhance their personal image.
Instantly detangles and create silky smooth feel

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2005
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best Conditioner For Men
reviews.reviewText: I have a full head of hair that tends to suffer from a cowlick in the back and just gets wild when I wash it daily, which I do by habit (and because I work out a lot.) I also have to wear a hat at work which makes it stick out at utterly insane angles (one friend even remarks that I look like a cardinal with all my hair pointedly protruding like tail feathers in the back), especially when it is hot and humid outside. Because of these physical follicular foibles, I have for years been looking for a conditioner that can help me control my hair without making it feel greasy or plastered down.This is the one. I can't imagine using another conditioner after using "American Crew Daily Conditioner For Men." It makes my hair hold its shape in all temperature and meteorological conditions (no more humidity issues), and doesn't change the fundamental texture of my hair. The woman who cuts my hair recommended this product, and for once it was a good suggestion. Normally the pitch for something like "Honey Mustard Dijonnaise Leave-In Conditioning Mousse" at the end of a haircut leaves me a bit skeptical. I was skeptical this time as well, especially after reading the claim that it "instantly detangles and create silky smooth feel" and "reduces oil texture." For once I was pleasantly surprised. This stuff is wonderful. Having had a lot of chemistry in my background, I suspect the secret of the control here is in the proportions of Methylparaben, Propylparaben, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone; while the refreshing and masculine scent is obviously due to the olfactory interactions of Rosemary (Rosmarinus Officinalis) Leaf Extract, Thymus Vulgaris (Thyme) Extract, Quilla Saporaria Bark Extract, Menthol, and Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil. (Don't let the hint of menthol frighten you off; it has a clean scent, not an antiseptic one.)The price seems a bit high on this product, but understand that the product is very concentrated, and requires much less per use than cheaper conditioners. I have a full head of hair and I require only a dime-sized dollop of conditioner to do the job. My last 15.2 ounce bottle lasted about five months.In summary, even if you are skeptical of conditioners and have searched for years, this is the product I recommend above all others for bringing your hair into submission.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The texture was great. The price was not for the size of the bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quality Conditioner & Nice Smelling
reviews.reviewText: This review is for American Crew Men's Conditioner, Daily Conditioner for Soft, Manageable Hair, Naturally Derived, Vegan Formula, Citrus Mint, 8.4 Oz. I started using American Crew products many years ago, when a hair stylist I started to go to used them. The products seem nice, so I have been using various ones over the years. I am no expert on hair conditioners, but this seems to be a good one. I don't have any complaints with it. A tiny amount goes a long way, and it smells nice. You can notice there is mint in it, because it has that slightly cold feeling that mint gives you. I would have to try this back-to-back with other quality conditioners to see how this stacks up. I have used quality conditioners from other brands over the years. I just don't recall how they compare to each other. I would say this at least 4 out 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GIVE YOUR ‘DOO THE CREW!
reviews.reviewText: I have used this product for years, lathering my hair with it after shampooing. This conditioner makes my sometimes wild hair more manageable. A great value!

reviews.reviewText: I’m a convert it just works; smells decent too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helps with Oily Hair
reviews.reviewText: Using this for just a couple of weeks I saw a huge difference in the volume and oils in my hair. A little pricey but you get what you pay for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good quality packaging, Nice sensation when applied.
reviews.reviewText: I really like how this was shipped, there were no leaks and the packaging was easy to remove.As for the actual conditioner, it has a very nice light scent (not to obvious since it is a conditioner). I bought this because I noticed that my scalp was a bit drier than normal so I had dandruff, and since I normally don't have dandruff I didn't want to invest in a dandruff shampoo, so I bought this. This has solved all my problems as a conditioner as I have little to no dandruff now and my scalp feels less dry.One thing that I loved (but you may not) about this conditioner is that it has a cooling sensation when applied to your wet hair. This is a similar situation when you chew mint gum, but a more subdued version of that for your head. It's not a chill burn by any means (it's actually more therapeutic), but it is noticeable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow my locks are so full-- well not really but needed a good headline
reviews.reviewText: I love this shampoo. It smells great, my hair feels great and if it helps regrow my thinning hair great. I have been using it for a while and havent seen an improvement however it might be working slowly on my emerging solar panel on top of my head. I didnt buy it for the hair growth, I purchased it for scent and how it makes my hair feel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 2, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Finally found a great conditioner. Don’t need to use it daily but does feel great when you do.
utilisation sur cheveux et barbe, très efficace et odeur très agréable
supero por mucho mis espectativas, los acondicionadores comerciales suelen dejar el pelo ceboso, no es el caso. En conjunto con el shampoo son el mejor producto para el pelo que he probado

reviews.reviewTitle: Buen acondicionador de uso diario, mentolado y con buen aroma.
reviews.reviewText: En general, los productos de American Crew me suelen funcionar muy bien y este acondicionador no es la excepción. A pesar de ser un acondicionador está indicado para su uso en todo el cabello y el cuero cabelludo. Tras dos semanas empleándolo mi cabello está más suave y peinable. El aroma es a menta y con un pequeño toque de romero, pero no es especialmente fuerte (a excepción de la menta). Como es mentolado, deja una sensación refrescante en el cuero cabelludo al emplearlo.
